name: RadLand
description:
A game I made for the Mini Jam 76: Radiation with the limitation of only use 1 hand to controls.

Note: Game is in a very buggy state still but decided to upload it for the jam because the concept is still there.

Controls:

left click to select units

right click to move units

Things I know about:

Turrets some reason target randomly

Overall it was a fun jam and the control system was fun to play with even though the game is not as finished as I would have liked

ps: Admins I forgot to add I used Blender for 3D models
